thread.title: Lori Bullio
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Lori Bullio

author: Lori Bullio
title: Lori Bullio
text: My daughter will be attending her first formal dance and we went to Peaches Boutique. We were greeted by a very friendly woman. She explained how the process went. Our Sales Associate, Isamara was so sweet and very helpful. My daughter was nervous, but Isamara made her feel very comfortable. From the time we arrived until the time we left, we received stellar service. Thank you, Peaches Boutique for making our first experience very special. We will definitely be referring your business and will definitely be repeat customers. Thank you, Peaches Boutique & Isamara!!
